org.ldaptive.referral

Class ModifyDnReferralHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.referral.AbstractReferralHandler<ModifyDnRequest,Void>
      • org.ldaptive.referral.ModifyDnReferralHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Handler<ModifyDnRequest,Response<Void>>, ReferralHandler<ModifyDnRequest,Void>

    public class ModifyDnReferralHandler
extends AbstractReferralHandler<ModifyDnRequest,Void>
    Provides handling of an ldap referral for modify dn operations.
